name: The Art of Explosions
description:
Fullscreen for best experience! 

Embark along the path of explosions and blast your way to victory.

An entry into mini-jam 32: explosions.

Supports controller or KB/M

Sidenote:

If playing the game a second time through without refreshing the page, the first cut-scene of the boss will be skipped. This is intentional. 

Soundtrack is here!  https://soundcloud.com/reeds-455516646/sets/the-art-of-explosions-ost
